events.message: I received the laptop yesterday and noticed that the screen has multiple scratches and some dead pixels, which is really disappointing.
The complaint was identified as a product defect issue based on the customer's description of screen damage and dead pixels.
Support agent James has been assigned to handle this product defect case involving a damaged laptop screen.
Hello, I’m James from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the scratches and dead pixels on your laptop screen. Let's work together to resolve this.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and dead pixels, along with the laptop’s order number for verification?
I have attached clear photos showing the damaged screen and included my order number 123456789 as requested.
Thank you for the info. We can offer a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop since I still want to use this model. Thank you for the quick response.
We have processed your replacement request and shipped the new laptop today. You will receive a shipping confirmation shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the replacement laptop and that it arrived in perfect condition.
